solution_line_template: He earned {num_large} x ${price_large} = $<<{num_large}*{price_large}={earned_large}>>{earned_large} for the large painting.
And he earned {num_small} x ${price_small} = $<<{num_small}*{price_small}={earned_small}>>{earned_small} for the small paintings.
Therefore, he earned a total of ${earned_large} + ${earned_small} = $<<{earned_large}+{earned_small}={total_earned}>>{total_earned} in all.
